title: Simulation/VR-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Activities involving mathematical modeling and problem-solving for real-life issues using smartphone-based VR apps and simple simulation tools.

learning_goals: Students can convert real-life problems into mathematical models and simulate them in VR environments
Students complete three or more mathematics projects by following semi-automatically structured activity sequences using learning design patterns
Students can produce project deliverables through collaboration and derive improvements via peer review

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
